Title: Superdonk
Plot: The Cloudbabies go on a picnic, taking lots of rainpears with them. After Bobo White feeds the rainpears to the skyhorsies, they fall into a deep sleep. How will the Cloudbabies get to do their chores now, without the skyhorsies or the skytrain to take them? It is up to Skydonk to save the day.
